top_comments.comment:
I'd really like to win the giveaway!
I'm italian so it's pretty common here to wear ADG as a signature.
Personally i don't have it, but i hope to add that to my collection :)

comments_since_last_sample.body: I have never rocked ADG, or even tried it. Even the sample I got ended up getting smashed by a friend before I had a chance to spray it.

I'm wearing Acqua di Gio right now! Just finished work, was pumped to see it in this video 😁 I love it so much that this current bottle is a replacement for one I knocked off my shelf and smashed a few months ago.. the bathroom smelt great for quite some time afterwards but the replacement wasn't what I wanted to be doing as it was still 3/4 full when it broke!
